entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 5.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers at times heavy. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
